properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, NICKNAME, EMAIL, MEMBER_GRADE, SHELTER_NO, ENROLL_DATE, RESENT_CONNECTION FROM MEMBER

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.NICKNAME, M.EMAIL, M.MEMBER_GRADE, M.SHELTER_NO, NVL(S.SHELTER_NAME,'해당없음') AS SHELTER_NAME, M.ENROLL_DATE, M.RESENT_CONNECTION FROM MEMBER M, SHELTER S WHERE M.SHELTER_NO = S.SHELTER_NO(+)
